course.subject: SBMT
course.name: Marketing Management and Strategy
course.description: The first part of this module covers marketing management using the framework of the 4P's (Product, Price, Promotion and Place).  Topics include consumer needs and wants, marketing research, advertising and sales promotion, pricing theory, etc.  The impact of the Internet on all aspects of marketing will also be examined.  The second part will cover marketing and business policy from a strategic perspective.  Decision making in a competitive environment in the face of environmental constraints will also be examined.  Registration is limited to students on the MSc program in Engineering Enterprise Management only.

reviews.author: sv1108
reviews.title: Excellent class - recommended
reviews.comment_content: Well explained all the marketing concepts for those students that do not have experience with it. At the same time, each class is really well defined on the topics that are going to be seen.
reviews.comment_teaching: Super interactive, and proactive to ask and answer questions. Makes you feel part of the class at all moments
reviews.comment_grading:
Very well distributed:
Attendance/ In-class exercises/ Homework/ Class
Participation - 15%
Term Test 1 - 25%  
Term Test 2 - 25%
Marketing Simulation Performance - 15%
Marketing Simulation Presentation - 20%
reviews.comment_workload: The marketing simulations are the only ones that take time because it is based on a weekly decision done by your team
